Subject: Video about daily life at our school.

Introduction: To support an idea to make a short video about daily life at our school I have spend some time discussing it with other students, observing and analaising an avrege day in our scholl and came up with some suggestions.

Places to video: We should try to video not only class rooms but also our playground, cafe, sport hall, art club and library. Most students spend a lot of their time in such places and they are very important part of our school life.

Activities to video: We should show students during their formal studies as well as after lessons. I think it is a good idea to include a record of one of our big events such as anual sport turnament or wellcoming evening for new students.
Conclugen: To sum up the above I'd like to suggest not to film anything longer than 1 or 2 minuts and have a nice mixture of places, faces and events.
If you have any further comments or questions regarding this case please let me know.
